h2_title: Where to Find the Daoist Mi
content: However, after climbing some stairs, you'll come across a special Sword Daoist ing a flute, and does not appear hostile. He'll actually ask a favor of you, noting that his fellow Daoists have all been partaking of Amourworm eggs, turning them into undying husks. He'll ask you to seek one out and return it to him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist_Mi.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist Mi', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Daoist Mi'.
The content is as follows:
However, after climbing some stairs, you'll come across a special Sword Daoist ing a flute, and does not appear hostile. He'll actually ask a favor of you, noting that his fellow Daoists have all been partaking of Amourworm eggs, turning them into undying husks. He'll ask you to seek one out and return it to him.
